title: Winter Mountain Climbing!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Even advanced climbers say that climbing up this mountain during the winter is difficult, but I think we can do it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Mountain climbing can be dangerous in any season. We should always be careful no matter what~ But there are some things about mountain climbing that you can only enjoy during the winter.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yeah, seeing the mountain covered with dead trees is fun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s so quiet out here~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yup. Right now, everything is resting and saving their strength for spring.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Umi-chan, let’s have some winter fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Like having hot cocoa at the summit!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I also brought marshmallows and raspberry jam. We can watch them float in the hot cocoa~ 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Having hot cocoa when it’s cold outside is as fun as having shaved ice in the height of summer!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Let’s make a campfire, too~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
